name: pieceForSmartphoneOrchestra
description: A sound piece for smartphone orchestra.

scripts.build: parcel build src/views/index.html src/views/directions.html src/views/instrument.html --dist-dir build
scripts.watch: parcel watch src/views/index.html src/views/directions.html src/views/instrument.html --dist-dir dist
scripts.prestart-dev: if [[ ! -d dist ]]; then echo Directory 'dir' does not exist. Run: 'npm run watch'.; false; else true; fi
scripts.prestart: if [[ ! -d build ]]; then echo Directory 'build' does not exist. Run: 'npm run build'; false; else true; fi
scripts.start: if [[ $? == 0 ]]; then NODE_ENV=production node backend/server.mjs --http-port $npm_package_config_httpPort --https-port $npm_package_config_httpsPort; fi
scripts.predeploy: rm -rf build && parcel build src/views/index.html src/views/directions.html src/views/instrument.html --dist-dir build --public-url tsmtzs.github.io/pieceForSmartphoneOrchestra

author: Tassos Tsesmetzis
